Appendix: Aligning EpiDoc supporting data with APIS

2022-07-20

See APIS Metadata Guidelines

Title Title and Publication Information
Author Title and Publication Information
Summary General keywords and taxonomies
Publications Bibliography
Inventory Id Repositories and inventory numbers
Physical Description Physical Description
Provenance Dates and locations of modern observations
Original Language Languages and scripts
Date Date of origin
General notes cf. Commentary
Subjects General keywords and taxonomies
License Title and publication information
Custodial History Modern observations or Repositories and inventory numbers
